entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:46 p.m. CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023
